mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "User" (department_id, emp_no, password, username, email, phone, role, profile_image, position) VALUES ( #{user.departmentId}, #{user.empNo}, #{user.password}, #{user.username}, #{user.email}, #{user.phone}, #{user.role}, #{user.profileImage}, #{user.position} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "User" INNER JOIN Department ON Department.id = "User".department_id WHERE "User".id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "User" WHERE role = 'employee' OR role = 'manager'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, u.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM "User" JOIN Department ON "User".department_id = Department.id ) u ) WHERE role NOT IN ('admin', 'department') ORDER BY emp_no offset #{offset} rows fetch next #{size} rows only
